items.title: Spandana Sphoorty posts Rs 360-crore loss in Q1; fourth in a row
items.description: Spandana Sphoorty Financial reported a consolidated net loss of ₹360 crore in the first fiscal quarter, marking its fourth consecutive quarterly loss due to high asset quality stress and a drop in business volume. The lender's consolidated income fell significantly, with increased provisions for bad loans and substantial loan write-offs contributing to the losses.
